meanings.definition: The berrylike fruit of the elder, used in making wine and jelly.
meanings.sent1: I picked some elderberries to make delicious jelly.
meanings.sent2: The elderberries were ripe and ready for harvesting.
meanings.sent3: The elderberries decided to have a party and invited the grapes.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a bowl of elderberries, sweet and infectious.
meanings.sent5: The scent of elderberries filled the air, enticing everyone nearby.

meanings.definition: A shrub or small tree of the honeysuckle family, bearing elderberries.
meanings.sent1: The elderberries on the shrub looked plump and juicy.
meanings.sent2: We planted a new elderberries tree in our garden.
meanings.sent3: The elderberries whispered secrets to the neighboring plants.
meanings.sent4: His wisdom was like a tree full of elderberries, abundant and comforting.
meanings.sent5: The birds chirped happily as they feasted on the elderberries from the tree.
